verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have <S%H2713>searched<s%> <S%H3045>me,<s%> and you know me.
You <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3427>sitting<s%> down and my <S%H6965>rising<s%> <S%H995>up.<s%> You perceive my <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> from <S%H7350>afar.<s%>
You <S%H2219>search<s%> out my <S%H734>path<s%> and my lying <S%H7252>down,<s%> and are <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with all my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For there is not a <S%H4405>word<s%> on my <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H3068>but,<s%> behold, Yahweh, you know it <S%H3045>altogether.<s%>
You <S%H6696>hem<s%> me in <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before.<s%> You <S%H7896>laid<s%> your hand on <S%H3709>me.<s%>
This <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is <S%H6383>beyond<s%> <S%H7682>me.<s%> It's lofty. I <S%H3201>can't<s%> attain it.
Where could I <S%H3212>go<s%> from your <S%H7307>Spirit?<s%> Or where could I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence?<s%>
If I ascend <S%H5266>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> you are <S%H3331>there.<s%> If I make my bed in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> behold, you are there!
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>dawn,<s%> and <S%H7931>settle<s%> in the uttermost <S%H319>parts<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>
Even there your <S%H3027>hand<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H3225>me,<s%> and your right hand will hold <S%H270>me.<s%>
If I <S%H559>say,<s%> "Surely the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> will <S%H7779>overwhelm<s%> <S%H216>me;<s%> the light around <S%H1157>me<s%> will be <S%H3915>night;<s%>"
even the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H2821>doesn't<s%> hide from <S%H3915>you,<s%> but the night <S%H215>shines<s%> as the <S%H3117>day.<s%> The <S%H2825>darkness<s%> is like light to <S%H219>you.<s%>
For you <S%H7069>formed<s%> my <S%H3629>inmost<s%> <S%H5526>being.<s%> You knit me together in my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb.<s%>

I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3372>you,<s%> for I am fearfully and wonderfully <S%H6395>made.<s%> Your <S%H4639>works<s%> are <S%H6381>wonderful.<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that very <S%H3966>well.<s%>
My <S%H6108>frame<s%> <S%H3582>wasn't<s%> hidden from <S%H6213>you,<s%> when I was made in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> <S%H7551>woven<s%> together in the <S%H8482>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> my <S%H1564>body.<s%> In your <S%H5612>book<s%> they were all <S%H3789>written,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that were <S%H3335>ordained<s%> for <S%H259>me,<s%> when as yet there were none of them.
How <S%H3365>precious<s%> to me are your <S%H7454>thoughts,<s%> <S%H410>God!<s%> How <S%H6105>vast<s%> is their <S%H7218>sum!<s%>
If I would <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H7235>them,<s%> they are more in number than the <S%H2344>sand.<s%> When I <S%H6974>wake<s%> <S%H5750>up,<s%> I am still with you.
If only <S%H433>you,<s%> God, would <S%H6991>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> Get <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H1818>me,<s%> you bloodthirsty <S%H582>men!<s%>
For they <S%H559>speak<s%> against you <S%H4209>wickedly.<s%> Your <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> your name in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8130>don't<s%> I hate those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6962>you?<s%> Am I not grieved with those who rise up against <S%H8618>you?<s%>
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with <S%H8503>perfect<s%> <S%H8135>hatred.<s%> They have become my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
<S%H2713>Search<s%> <S%H410>me,<s%> God, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart.<s%> <S%H974>Try<s%> <S%H3045>me,<s%> and know my <S%H8312>thoughts.<s%>
<S%H7200>See<s%> if there is any <S%H6090>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H5148>me,<s%> and lead me in the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>
